heroSubtitle: Kubaka ubwizigame bwawe uzitabira gutanga 20% ku burezi bw'abana. Buri mezi 6, ubwizigame bwawe bufasha guhindura ejo hazaza h'umwana.
howItWorksSubtitle: Inzira yoroshye igizwe n'intambwe eshatu ihindura ubwizigame bwawe igufashe
stepSaveDesc: Kubaka ubwizigame bwawe mu mezi 6 ushyiramo amafaranga igihe icyo ari cyo cyose. Amafaranga yawe akura mugihe witegura gutanga.
stepGiveDesc: Nyuma y'amezi 6, utanga 20% y'ubwizigame bwawe ku burezi bw'abana. Ugumana 80% uzanye itandukaniro ryiza.
stepImpactDesc: Reba umusanzu wawe uhindura ubuzima. Buri mutango utanga ibikoresho by'amashuri n'ibikoresho by'uburezi ku bana bakeneye.
collectiveImpactSubtitle: Hamwe, umuryango wacu urimo gukora itandukaniro rikomeye mu buzima bw'abana
missionSubtitle: Gutuma Uburezi Bugerwaho na Buri Mwana
missionDesc: AidVault yashinzwe ku kwizera kuroshye: ko buri wese ashobora gukora itandukaniro iyo ahawe ibikoresho bikwiye. Twaremye urubuga rutuma gutanga bifasha, byoroshye kandi bitera imbere.
testimonialSubtitle: Ifatanye n'ibihumbi by'abantu barimo gukora itandukaniro
joinCommunity: Ifatanye n'umuryango wacu w'ababika batanga kandi utangire urugendo rwawe mu ngaruka z'ingenzi. Bifata iminota mike gusa gushyiraho ubwizigame bwawe.
noCreditCard: Nta karita y'inguzanyo isabwa. Tangira n'umubare uwo ari wo wose.

testimonials.name: Ishimwe Melissa
testimonials.quote: AidVault yahinduriye uburyo nkurikiza kubika. Kumenya ko igice cy'ubwizigame bwanjye gishyigikira uburezi bw'abana bitanga intego nyayo kuri buri musanzu.

testimonials.name: Nkurunziza Kevin
testimonials.quote: Ikitandukanya AidVault ni ukugaragara kwayo. Urubuga rugaragaza neza uburyo amafaranga akoreshwa n'ingaruka atanga, bituma haba icyizere ku ntego.

testimonials.name: Mukamana Bella
testimonials.quote: AidVault intuma guteganya ejo hazaza hanjye nk'uko ntanga ku burezi bw'undi muntu. Uburinganire bashyizeho butuma kubika ari ikintu gifatika kandi gifite icyo kivuze.
